snippet.title: Duck Souls+ Trailer (PS4/Vita Asia)
snippet.description:
Duck Souls+ is a fast-paced, action platformer about a little duck with an incredible skill to dash and a mission, find all the eggs to save his species.

Duck Souls+ is set in a cute and deadly fantasy world, where many traps will rip your wings off your body while you struggle to grasp the frail, fragile egg.

Run, jump and dash through a colourful and treacherous environment to save everyone and become a hero, if you can.

Features:

• Play 100 hand-crafted brutal levels filled with deadly traps 
• Jump over spikes, climb walls, and avoid death 
• Challenge your platforming skills with hardcore difficulty
• Survive over 20 different types of deadly traps
• Collect 20 different hats and customize your duck!

© Ratalaika Games SL, Green Dinosaur Games. Licensed to and published by Eastasiasoft Limited. All Rights Reserved.
